name: Pyramic City Run
description: craziest idea of running dash and surfing in the Pyramid cities with next generation Princess of Pyramid to escape from enemy. Help Princess to collect the gold and surf on the roads. Dash as fast as you can, dodge the oncoming trains and buses. Careful the rolling wood in the cities! Intuitive controls to run left or right, jump in the sky to obtain more coins, excited slide to safety! Run along the craziest scenarios in the Subway Princess game in City and town. Drag to jump or slide and to move left or right. Avoid hitting train and buses. Run around different scenarios and gather all the coins you can. Subway Princess is one of the best escape runner game. Avoid the accident with the train driver and collect the coin power to safe your journey. Subway Princess of Egypt is an endless princess running game, to be the best runner, save the brave princess . Unlock the level to get more characters, Get more and more diamond or coins as you can!
